IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_relationships') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_relationships GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_relationships @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT r.target_id, g.guild_name, g.guild_mark_code, r.relationship_type, r.relationship_at FROM Guild_Relationship_Infos AS r INNER JOIN Guilds AS g ON r.target_id = g.id WHERE r.owner_id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
